text: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

translation.en: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing
translation.id: Sungguh, Dia (Allah) pasti akan memasukkan mereka ke tempat masuk (surga) yang mereka sukai. Dan sesungguhnya Allah Maha Mengetahui, Maha Penyantun
